category: National Team Athletesâ€™ Village Operation Regulations/Article 18 (Cancellation of Temporary Use Approval)
contents: Article 18 (Cancellation of temporary use approval) The athlete village head may cancel temporary use approval if any of the following reasons exist. Revised 2020. 10. 23. 1. When violating the approved purpose of use 2. When violating the compliance requirements in Appendix 2 or the conditions for facility use under Article 16 (2) 3. When engaging in an act that harms the training atmosphere of national team players 4. When it is recognized that there is a special need to temporarily suspend use, such as use for profit-making activities.
